text:
Message 1442 of 4024
So.... What’s next? Just go back into our bunker and lob bombs?
I spent two weeks hearing:
“thank you for the thoughtful effort”
“I appreciate the positive tone today”
“If patient I’ll come back this afternoon”
.... Crickets...
But I’m sure you were doing the best you could. I realize this is hard for you. But we are never going to agree on perspectives so the question is do we
accept that, learn how to be nice given that, and try to be kind and constructive.
I’d like a dialog, but I’d like some commitment and follow. I hope that is reasonable. I really just wish we were not set up to hate each other for profit
by others since August. But we are where we are. Hope they enjoy the new hot-tub.
What would you like to do? This is not working and saying that every day seems dumb to both of us.
I’m all in if you would like to try, Christine.
Have a great day and enjoy the sunshine!
- robert
Sent:02/16/2024 at 09:15 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/16/2024 at 09:17 AM)
Subject:Re: From Dec 11th
Message 1443 of 4024
I know we both want to move this forward so we can both focus on positive aspects and rebuild our lives to be happy.
The divorce is happening.
We need a parenting plan, either with assistance with Dr Brown, engage a parent evaluator, hash out in mediation, have judge decide.
Align on child support
Align on spousal support
Align on division of assets
Set a mediation date.
We both need to accept realities of where you and I are now in communications and what we can expect or not from the other.
Sent:02/16/2024 at 09:22 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/16/2024 at 09:23 AM)
Subject:Re: From Dec 11th
